title: Application error
body:
When starting league after I hit play before the login screen I get the error

'The application was unable to start correctly (0xc00000a5). Click OK to close the applilcation.

Then when I close and start again, it tells me league is already running and i get a black screen the size of the league screen. 

Any suggestions on how to fix this problem?
Thanks!

replies.body:
It sounds like this may have happened after updating to the Beta client. You should be able to resolve this by completing the steps below:

> * Go to C:\Riot Games\League of Legends-AIR ONLY\RADS\system
* Open **user.cfg** with notepad
* Change leagueClientOptIn = yes to **leagueClientOptIn = no**
* Save and then Launch League

Let me know if this helped. ^.^
